samples.question: By plane, train, or car?
samples.transcript: I usually walk, not using any specific transportations at all. Cause, well, you know, I care about my carbon footprint. So I would not usually use transportations to go to places. And I do not have a license to do so. So I just walk.
samples.transcript_original: I usually walk, not using any specific transportations at all. Cause, well, you know, I care about my carbon footprint. So I wouldn't usually use transportations to go to places. And I do not have a license to do so. So I just walk.

samples.question: And who do you usually travel with?
samples.transcript: Mostly my parents and my brother. Since I am not like old enough to go travel alone or go with my friends. So my family is the one who I travel the most with.
samples.transcript_original: Mostly my parents and my brother. Since I'm not like old enough to go travel alone or go with my friends. So my family is the one who I travel the most with.

samples.question: What kind of weather do you enjoy the most?
samples.transcript: This might sound strange, but I prefer rainy weather whenever it is big rain or just small droplets of water. I enjoy the, well, the atmosphere whenever it is watery and, I enjoy the sound that the water droplets make and it makes me feel calm and whenever I need to kick back and enjoy a book, that is the perfect weather.

samples.question: And how does the weather affect your plans?
samples.transcript: I would not say it has a big impact on my plans since I mostly plan my schedule indoors and I do not go outside much since I have a lot of my plates and I have been snow under a lot of pressures and homework so I have not got time to go out yet so I usually just plan things indoors. I do not go outside that much so. Yeah.

samples.question: What environmental problems are common in your area?
samples.transcript: I would say noise pollution. Oh, and they are a, you know, a company near my house. And whenever it is nighttime, they usually have those big cars that will transport all the goods, all the food and stuff into that company. So it makes really loud noises, especially at midnight. And I cannot sleep. And let my hair down after a tiring day at work. Because of it.

samples.question: Yeah, what is the role of education in raising environmental awareness?
samples.transcript: Oh, I think that it plays a key role in teaching how to protect the environment for young children. And, by teaching children and young generations to protect the environment, and raise their awareness, I think that it is a way to, a very effective way to, well, Solve environmental problems. Yay!
